# Emacs 4 Latex Support (Windows)
Chunqi Shi (chunqi.shi@hotmail.com)

## Update
* 2013-04-25

## Version

* 0.2.1
* Tested under Window 7 Home Premium.

## About

* Configure a Emacs editor for latex compile in Windows environment.
* An easy installation of Emacs as latex editor for newbie.

## Change Log

* Add: shortcut to desktop.
* Add: register file for texfiles(*.tex, *.bib, *.sty, *.cls).
* Add: tiny tools: 1) convert pdf to eps; 2) merge bibtex
* Fix: Emacs.bat open file error, when filename has space.

## Built-in Plugins

* [Aspell 0.50.3](http://aspell.net/win32/) (4 Spelling Check)
* [backup-each-save 2011-08-03](http://www.emacswiki.org/emacs/BackupEachSave)(4 Backup Each Edition)
* [Sumatra PDF 2.2.1](http://blog.kowalczyk.info/software/sumatrapdf/download-free-pdf-viewer.html)(4 PDF Viewer) [CTR+c CTR+v]
* [Predictive Mode 0.23.13](http://www.emacswiki.org/emacs/PredictiveMode)(Tips for Word Completion) [CTR+x TAB]
* [goto-last-change 1.2](http://www.emacswiki.org/emacs/goto-last-change.el)(Go to Last Change) [CTR+x ,]

## Portable

Register: Emacs_Register.bat; *Run as Administrator* 
(move .emacs to %HOME%; add Desktop shortcut; add %PATH%;)

## Download

### TexLive 2012: 
http://www.tug.org/texlive/acquire-netinstall.html
### Emacs 24.3: 
http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/emacs/windows/
### Auctex 11.87: 
http://www.gnu.org/software/auctex/download-for-windows.html
### SumatraPDF 2.5.0: 
http://blog.kowalczyk.info/software/sumatrapdf/download-free-pdf-viewer.html

## Install

### UNZIP: 
* into %TEXLIVE_HOME%, exists %TEXLIVE_HOME%/install-tl*/install-t1-advanced.bat 
* into %EMACS_HOME%, exists %EMACS_HOME%/bin 
* into %AUCTEX_HOME%, exists %AUCTEX_HOME%/site-lisp/auctex 
* into %EMACS4LS_HOME%, exists %EMACS4LS_HOME%/bin

### COPY: 
* from %AUCTEX_HOME%/* to %EMACS_HOME%/ --> (Install Auctext into Emacs) 
* from %EMACS4LS_HOME%/* to %EMACS_HOME%/ --> (Install Emacs4LS into Emacs) 
* from %SumatraPDF*.exe to %EMACS_HOME%/bin/SumatraPDF.exe --> (Update SumatraPDF into Emacs)

### RUN: 
* run %TEXLIVE_HOME%/install-tl-*/install-tl-advanced.bat --> (Install Texlive 2012) 
* run %EMACS_HOME%/Emacs_Register.bat --> (Register .emacs plugins)

### PATH: 
* add %EMACS_HOME%\bin\ into %PATH% of OS Environment 
* add %EMACS_HOME%\aspell\bin\ into %PATH% of OS Environment

## Tiny Tools

### Emacs_MGBib.bat 
* @usage: Emacs_MGBib.bat file1.bib file2.bib file3.bib ... 
* @description: merge bible files

### Emacs_PDF2PS.bat 
* @usage: Emacs_PDF2PS.bat file1.pdf file2.pdf file3.pdf ... 
* @description: convert pdf to eps (figures)

## More

* Register into Right Click Menu:  use [FileMenuTools](http://www.lopesoft.com/en/filemenutools);
* Create Shortcut:  refer to emacs (shortcut) under %EMACS_HOME%;

## Keys

* Key Bindings | F1 b | CTR+H b
* Jump to Reference | CTR+C &
* Key Manual | CTR+H k
* Predict Model | CTR+X tab

## Links

* [Latex Symbols](http://www.artofproblemsolving.com/Wiki/index.php/LaTeX:Symbols)
* [Auctex Shortcuts](http://www.ai.soc.i.kyoto-u.ac.jp/~shi/latex/files/auctex-ref.pdf)
* [Emacs Shortcut ](http://www.ai.soc.i.kyoto-u.ac.jp/~shi/latex/files/emacs-refcard-a4.pdf)
* [Das Latex-Buch](http://www.latexbuch.de/install-latex-windows-7/#x1-60002) (Install LaTeX for Windows 7 - a complete setup)
* [From Latex to HTML](http://www.tug.org/applications/tex4ht/mn-commands.html)
* [BibTeX and bibliography styles](http://amath.colorado.edu/documentation/LaTeX/reference/faq/bibstyles.html) ([examples](http://www.ai.soc.i.kyoto-u.ac.jp/~shi/latex/files/bibstyles.pdf))
